description: Procurement of suspended personnel platform suitable for use with up to three people
full_summary:
### Government Tender Announcement

#### Request for Proposal

A Request for Proposal (RFP) is being issued by Public Works and Government Services Canada (PWGSC) on behalf of the Department of National Defence for the procurement of a suspended personnel platform.

#### Contract Details

- **Contract Title**: W355B-237053-B Suspended Personnel Platform
- **Contract Reference**: WS4223555314
- **Publication Date**:  January 18, 2024
- **Tender Closing Date**: February 9, 2024 at 2:00:00 PM AST

#### Procurement Method and Criteria

A competitive bidding approach will be used. The selection criteria are based on the lowest price.

#### Scope of Work

The procurement objective is to acquire one (1) suspended personnel platform suitable for use with up to three people. The platform must meet the requirements detailed in Annex A.

#### Contact Information

For more information or to obtain the tender documents, please contact:

Simon Presse
PWGSC/PSPC
Contact Email: [simon.presse@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca](mailto:simon.presse@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca)

#### Notice URL

The tender documents can be accessed from the following website: https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/18555912?extsite=MTg1NTU5MTJfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==

#### Region of Opportunity

The delivery is expected to be in Halifax. The trade agreements include the Canadian Free Trade Agreement.

### Limitation on Tenders
No limitation has been applied to this tender.

### Addition Information
A debriefing or feedback meeting will be available upon request for bidders, offerors or suppliers who submitted an offer in the previous solicitation.
This tender is issued in accordance with the Trade Agreement: Canadian Free Trade Agreement. Query to the Contracting Authority regarding discrimination. Specific client name: Department of National Defence (DND). Goods or Services category Material Handling Machinery and Equipment. Exclusion criteria  Lifting Equipment and Accessories.
